body:
I have xcode installed. You have to explain the error, its YOUR error. Your code assumes
something about the available C headers which is incorrect. I am trying to build the same
go as you would for distribution, so disabling a key feature is not an option.

Traditional (horrible) configuration systems check the available resources
are available so that the do not bug out in an incomprehensible way.
If this file is required, and is not standard on all OSX/xcode installs, you should 
test for it and bug out the build with a suitable message.
